00054 namespace {
00055 
00056   enum TypeMask {
00057     ROW_KEY =           (1 << 0),
00058     TIMESTAMP =         (1 << 1)
00059   };
00060 
00061   inline bool should_skip(int idx, const uint32_t *masks, bool dupkeycols) {
00062     uint32_t bm = masks[idx];
00063     return bm && ((bm & TIMESTAMP) || !(dupkeycols && (bm & ROW_KEY)));
00064   }
00065 
00066 } // local namespace
00067 
00071 LoadDataSource::LoadDataSource(int row_uniquify_chars, bool dupkeycols)
00072   : m_type_mask(0), m_cur_line(0), m_line_buffer(0),
00073     m_row_key_buffer(0), m_hyperformat(false), m_leading_timestamps(false),
00074     m_timestamp_index(-1), m_timestamp(AUTO_ASSIGN), m_offset(0),
00075     m_zipped(false), m_rsgen(0), m_row_uniquify_chars(row_uniquify_chars),
00076     m_dupkeycols(dupkeycols) {
00077   if (row_uniquify_chars)
00078     m_rsgen = new FixedRandomStringGenerator(row_uniquify_chars);
00079 
00080   return;
00081 }

00083 void
00084 LoadDataSource::init(const std::vector<String> &key_columns, const String &timestamp_column)
00085 {
00086   String header;
00087   init_src();
00088   header = get_header();
00089   parse_header(header, key_columns, timestamp_column);
00090 }

00092 void
00093 LoadDataSource::parse_header(const String &header, const std::vector<String> &key_columns,
00094                              const String &timestamp_column) {
00095 
00096   String line, column_name;
00097   char *base, *ptr, *colon_ptr;
00098   int index = 0;
00099   KeyComponentInfo key_comps;
00100   ColumnInfo cinfo;
00101 
00102   // Assuming max column size of 256
00103   m_type_mask = new uint32_t [257];
00104   memset(m_type_mask, 0, 257*sizeof(uint32_t));
00105 
00106   base = (char *)header.c_str();
00107   if (*base == '#') {
00108     base++;
00109     while (isspace(*base))
00110       base++;
00111   }
00112 
00113   ptr = strchr(base, '\t');
00114 
00115   while (base) {
00116 
00117     if (ptr)
00118       *ptr++ = 0;
00119 
00120     colon_ptr = strchr(base, ':');
00121     if (colon_ptr) {
00122       cinfo.family = String(base, colon_ptr - base);
00123       cinfo.qualifier = colon_ptr+1;
00124     }
00125     else {
00126       cinfo.family = base;
00127       cinfo.qualifier = "";
00128     }
00129 
00130     m_column_info.push_back(cinfo);
00131 
00132     if (timestamp_column != "" && timestamp_column == cinfo.family) {
00133       m_timestamp_index = index;
00134       m_type_mask[index] |= TIMESTAMP;
00135     }
00136 
00137     index++;
00138     HT_EXPECT(index < 256, Error::TOO_MANY_COLUMNS);
00139 
00140     if (ptr) {
00141       base = ptr;
00142       ptr = strchr(base, '\t');
00143     }
00144     else
00145       base = 0;
00146   }
00147 
00148 
00152   for (size_t i=0; i<key_columns.size(); i++) {
00153     size_t j;
00154     const char *ptr;
00155 
00156     key_comps.clear();
00157 
00158     if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "\\%"))
00159       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00160     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%0")) {
00161       key_comps.pad_character = '0';
00162       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00163       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00164       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00165       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00166         ptr++;
00167       column_name = String(ptr);
00168     }
00169     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%-")) {
00170       key_comps.left_justify = true;
00171       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00172       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00173       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00174       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00175         ptr++;
00176       column_name = String(ptr);
00177     }
00178     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%")) {
00179       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00180       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00181       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00182       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00183         ptr++;
00184       column_name = String(ptr);
00185     }
00186     else
00187       column_name = key_columns[i];
00188 
00189     for (j=0; j<m_column_info.size(); j++) {
00190       if (m_column_info[j].family == column_name) {
00191         key_comps.index = j;
00192         m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00193         m_type_mask[j] |= ROW_KEY;
00194         break;
00195       }
00196     }
00197     if (j == m_column_info.size()) {
00198       cout << "ERROR: key column '" << column_name
00199            << "' not found in input file" << endl;
00200       exit(1);
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   if (m_key_comps.empty()) {
00205     key_comps.clear();
00206     m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00207     m_type_mask[0] |= ROW_KEY;
00208   }
00209 
00210   if (m_column_info.size() == 3 || m_column_info.size() == 4) {
00211     size_t i=m_column_info.size()-3;
00212     if ((m_column_info[i].family == "rowkey" ||
00213          m_column_info[i].family == "row") &&
00214         (m_column_info[i+1].family == "columnkey" ||
00215          m_column_info[i+1].family == "column") &&
00216         m_column_info[i+2].family == "value") {
00217       if (i == 0 || m_column_info[0].family == "timestamp") {
00218         m_hyperformat = true;
00219         m_leading_timestamps = (i==1);
00220       }
00221     }
00222   }
00223 
00224   m_next_value = m_column_info.size();
00225   m_limit = 0;
00226 
00227   if (!m_hyperformat && m_column_info.size() < 2)
00228     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_BAD_LOAD_FILE_FORMAT,
00229              "No columns specified in load file");
00230 
00231   m_cur_line = 1;
00232 }

00237 bool
00238 LoadDataSource::next(uint32_t *type_flagp, KeySpec *keyp,
00239     uint8_t **valuep, uint32_t *value_lenp, uint32_t *consumedp) {
00240   String line;
00241   int index;
00242   char *base, *ptr, *colon, *endptr;
00243 
00244   if (type_flagp)
00245     *type_flagp = FLAG_INSERT;
00246 
00247   if (consumedp)
00248     *consumedp = 0;
00249 
00250   if (m_hyperformat) {
00251 
00252     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00253       m_cur_line++;
00254 
00255       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00256         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00257 
00258       m_line_buffer.clear();
00259 
00260       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00261 
00262       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00263 
00267       if (m_leading_timestamps) {
00268         if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00269           cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00270           continue;
00271         }
00272         *ptr++ = 0;
00273         keyp->timestamp = strtoll(base, &endptr, 10);
00274         if (*endptr != 0) {
00275           cerr << "error: invalid timestamp (" << base << ") on line "
00276                << m_cur_line << endl;
00277           continue;
00278         }
00279         base = ptr;
00280       }
00281       else
00282         keyp->timestamp = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00283 
00287       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00288         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00289         continue;
00290       }
00291       if (m_rsgen) {
00292         keyp->row_len = (ptr-base) + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00293         m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00294         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(keyp->row_len + 1);
00295         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(base, ptr-base);
00296         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00297         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00298         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00299       }
00300       else {
00301         keyp->row = base;
00302         keyp->row_len = ptr - base;
00303       }
00304       *ptr++ = 0;
00305       base = ptr;
00306 
00310       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00311         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00312         continue;
00313       }
00314       *ptr = 0;
00315 
00316       if ((colon = strchr(base, ':')) != 0) {
00317         *colon++ = 0;
00318         keyp->column_family = base;
00319         if (colon < ptr) {
00320           keyp->column_qualifier = colon;
00321           keyp->column_qualifier_len = ptr - colon;
00322         }
00323         else {
00324           keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00325           keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00326         }
00327       }
00328       else {
00329         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00330         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00331       }
00332       keyp->column_family = base;
00333       ptr++;
00334 
00338       *valuep = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00339       *value_lenp = strlen(ptr);
00340 
00341       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00342         *consumedp = incr_consumed();
00343       }
00344 
00345       return true;
00346     }
00347   }
00348   else {
00349 
00350     // skip timestamp and rowkey (if needed)
00351     while (m_next_value < m_limit &&
00352            should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00353       m_next_value++;
00354 
00355     // get from parsed cells if available
00356     if (m_next_value > 0 && m_next_value < m_limit) {
00357       keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00358       keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00359       keyp->column_family = m_column_info[m_next_value].family.c_str();
00360       keyp->timestamp = m_timestamp;
00361 
00362       // clear these, just in case they were set by the client
00363       if (m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.empty()) {
00364         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00365         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00366       }
00367       else {
00368         keyp->column_qualifier = m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.c_str();
00369         keyp->column_qualifier_len =
00370             m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.length();
00371       }
00372       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00373         *valuep = 0;
00374         *value_lenp = 0;
00375       }
00376       else {
00377         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00378         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00379       }
00380       m_next_value++;
00381 
00382       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00383         *consumedp = incr_consumed();
00384       }
00385 
00386       return true;
00387     }
00388 
00389     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00390       m_cur_line++;
00391       index = 0;
00392 
00393       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00394         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00395 
00396       boost::trim(line);
00397       if (line.length() == 0)
00398         continue;
00399 
00400       m_line_buffer.clear();
00401       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00402       m_values.clear();
00403 
00404       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00405 
00406       while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00407         *ptr++ = 0;
00408 
00409         if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") ||
00410             !strcmp(base, "\\N")) {
00411           if (m_type_mask[index]) {
00412             cout << "WARNING: Required key or timestamp field not found "
00413                 "on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00414             continue;
00415           }
00416           m_values.push_back(0);
00417         }
00418         else
00419           m_values.push_back(base);
00420 
00421         base = ptr;
00422         index++;
00423       }
00424       if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") || !strcmp(base, "\\N"))
00425         m_values.push_back(0);
00426       else
00427         m_values.push_back(base);
00428 
00429       m_limit = std::min(m_values.size(), m_column_info.size());
00430 
00434       m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00435       if (!add_row_component(0))
00436         continue;
00437 
00438       size_t i;
00439       for (i=1; i<m_key_comps.size(); i++) {
00440         m_row_key_buffer.add(" ", 1);
00441         if (!add_row_component(i))
00442           break;
00443       }
00444       if (i<m_key_comps.size())
00445         continue;       // rowkey not found. warning in add_row_component.
00446 
00447       m_row_key_buffer.ensure(1);
00448       *m_row_key_buffer.ptr = 0;
00449 
00450       if (m_timestamp_index >= 0) {
00451         struct tm tm;
00452         time_t t;
00453 
00454         if (m_values.size() <= (size_t)m_timestamp_index) {
00455           cerr << "warn: timestamp field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00456                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00457           continue;
00458         }
00459 
00460         if (!parse_date_format(m_values[m_timestamp_index], &tm)) {
00461           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00462                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00463           continue;
00464         }
00465 
00466         if ((t = timegm(&tm)) == (time_t)-1) {
00467           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00468                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00469           continue;
00470         }
00471 
00472         m_timestamp = (uint64_t)t * 1000000000LL;
00473       }
00474       else
00475         m_timestamp = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00476 
00477       m_next_value = 0;
00478       while (should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00479         m_next_value++;
00480 
00481       if (m_rsgen) {
00482         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_row_uniquify_chars + 2);
00483         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00484         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill() + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00485         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00486         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00487         m_row_key_buffer.ptr += m_row_uniquify_chars;
00488       }
00489       else {
00490         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00491         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00492       }
00493 
00494       keyp->column_family = m_column_info[m_next_value].family.c_str();
00495       keyp->timestamp = m_timestamp;
00496 
00497       if (m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.empty()) {
00498         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00499         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00500       }
00501       else {
00502         keyp->column_qualifier = m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.c_str();
00503         keyp->column_qualifier_len =
00504             m_column_info[m_next_value].qualifier.length();
00505       }
00506 
00507       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00508         *valuep = 0;
00509         *value_lenp = 0;
00510       }
00511       else {
00512         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00513         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00514       }
00515       m_next_value++;
00516 
00517       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00518         *consumedp = incr_consumed();
00519       }
00520 
00521       return true;
00522     }
00523 
00524   }
00525 
00526   return false;
00527 }

00530 
00531 bool LoadDataSource::add_row_component(int index) {
00532   const char *value = m_values[m_key_comps[index].index];
00533   size_t value_len = 0;
00534 
00535   if (value == 0) {
00536     cout << "WARNING: Required key field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00537          << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00538     return false;
00539   }
00540 
00541   value_len = strlen(value);
00542 
00543   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].index >= m_values.size() || value == 0) {
00544     cout << "WARNING: Required key field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00545          << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00546     return false;
00547   }
00548 
00549   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].width > value_len) {
00550     size_t padding = m_key_comps[index].width - value_len;
00551     m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_key_comps[index].width);
00552     if (m_key_comps[index].left_justify) {
00553       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00554       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00555       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00556     }
00557     else {
00558       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00559       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00560       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00561     }
00562   }
00563   else
00564     m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00565 
00566   return true;
00567 
00568 }
00569 
00570 bool LoadDataSource::parse_date_format(const char *str, struct tm *tm) {
00571   int ival;
00572   const char *ptr = str;
00573   char *end_ptr;
00574 
00578   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 4 ||
00579       *end_ptr != '-')
00580     return false;
00581 
00582   tm->tm_year = ival - 1900;
00583   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00584 
00588   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00589       *end_ptr != '-')
00590     return false;
00591 
00592   tm->tm_mon = ival - 1;
00593   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00594 
00598   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00599       *end_ptr != ' ')
00600     return false;
00601 
00602   tm->tm_mday = ival;
00603   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00604 
00608   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00609   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00610     return false;
00611   tm->tm_hour = ival;
00612 
00613   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00614 
00618   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00619   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00620     return false;
00621   tm->tm_min = ival;
00622 
00623   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00624 
00628   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00629   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2)
00630     return false;
00631   tm->tm_sec = ival;
00632 
00633   tm->tm_gmtoff = 0;
00634   tm->tm_zone = "GMT";
00635 
00636   return true;
00637 }
